// Pivot 0, 0
int pinballdefinitivo[14] = {
	105, 551,
	105, 599,
	135, 620,
	139, 620,
	139, 616,
	114, 553,
	110, 548
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float pinballdefinitivo[14] = {
	0.234375f, 0.750681f,
	0.234375f, 0.816076f,
	0.301339f, 0.844687f,
	0.310268f, 0.844687f,
